fields.name: Pre-certification Patient Type
fields.description: pre-certification patient type refers to User-defined Table 0150 - Pre-certification patient type for suggested values

fields.name: Pre-certification Required
fields.description: pre-certification required refers to HL7 table 0136 - Yes/no indicator for valid values

fields.name: Pre-certification Window
fields.description: pre-certification window is the amount of time required to attain certification from arrival at the institution. Its format follows the time stamp (TS) data type rules.
